# VEHICLE::SET_VEHICLE_DOORS_SHUT

## Summary
Shuts all the doors on a vehicle

## Parameters
* **VEHICLE_INDEX** vehicle
* **BOOL** shutInstantly = true

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Closes all doors of a vehicle:
